task.title: How to Purchase Your Very Own Apartment Key

taskbody.context: This task will teach you how to navigate your way to the Foxridge Welcome Center to purchase your very own key to your new apartment.

step.cmd: On your smartphone, plug in the address to the Welcome Center (750 Hethwood Blvd. 100G, Blacksburg, VA 24060)
Once you have found the welcome center, walk inside and ask for Janice
Tell Janice that you need a key for apartment 10000 B/D â€“ the cost of the key is $25
